name: Chicken Wings 4 - Gold Rush
description:
Roost-Air is still in business. Seemingly unaffected by the economy the flying chickens are still going strong with Julio keeping Chuck flying and Chuck continuing to make the airspace less safe. 
Is Hans floating his yogurt money into the FBO?
Will Chuck finish his Corsair this year?
Is Julio ever going to get a few days off?

What we do know is that Chuck once again is getting himself tangled up in all kinds of aviation adventures from flight instructing, to homebuliding, into RC planes and model rockets, over flight simming, all the way to flying helicopters.
Chuck has to take a checkride and even applies to become an astronaut. He is also working on finding out more about the mystery chick at the bar and trying to help Julio in the hangar.
Then one day a call comes in for Roost Air to deliver parts to the last frontier...

159 pages, full color. 
Product dimensions: 20 x 20 x 1,3 cm, 500g. 
ISBN 978-1-4675-2065-2 
Published by Michael and Stefan Strasser

For a signed copy, please choose the option "one signed copy" below and make sure to drop us a line via email, or add instructions to the comments at checkout to tell us what you want Stefan to write (e.g. a dedication to someone). If we don't get any instructions, Stefan will write a dedicaction to the person who ordered!

name: The Aviation Comic Canon
description:
The ultimate collection of aviation related comic books in our shop. It consists of the following books:
  • Chicken Wings – The First Book
  • Chicken Wings 2 – Full Throttle
  • Chicken Wings 3 – Think Big
  • Chicken Wings 4 - Gold Rush
  • Ding Duck - I want to fly
  • Please Wait, to be seated
  • Going Up, Sir
  • Good Landing
Get them all together, save a bunch of money, and be entertained for many weeks!

name: Chicken Wings 3 - Think Big
description:
With employees like these, it is one of aviation’s greatest mysteries how “Roost Air” manages to stay in business. But here they are again! In this third Chicken Wings comic collection, Chuck and his fellow chickens seamlessly pick up where they left off in the last book and continue to live through the ups and downs of flying for a living.

Besides unsettling the airspace, Chuck also embarks on the high-flying mission of building his own vintage airplane. Will he succeed? Oh, the unbearable, nerve-wracking suspense! Buy the book and find out!

159 pages, full color.
Product dimensions: 20 x 20 x 1,3 cm, 500g
ISBN 978-1-60702-858-1
Published by Michael and Stefan Strasser

For a signed copy, please choose the option "one signed copy" below and make sure to drop us a line via email, or add instructions to the comments at checkout to tell us what you want Stefan to write (e.g. a dedication to someone). If we don't get any instructions, Stefan will write a dedicaction to the person who ordered!

name: Chicken Wings 2 - Full Throttle
description:
Whoever said chickens can’t fly? The eagerly awaited sequel of of the successful new aviation comic series “Chicken Wings” is here! Including more strips, more aviation, more “fowl” jokes, the full-color masterpiece “Chicken Wings 2 – Full Throttle” shows that our cocky proclamation that “we’ve only just begun” was not an empty threat!

Those magnificent chickens in their aerial machines are back to mess up your airspace and bring you knee-slapping laughter again, all of them being a year older but none the wiser.

105 pages, full color.

For a signed copy, please choose the option "one signed copy" below and make sure to drop us a line via email, or add instructions to the comments at checkout to tell us what you want Stefan to write (e.g. a dedication to someone). If we don't get any instructions, Stefan will write a dedicaction to the person who ordered!

name: Chicken Wings - The First Book
description:
“Chicken Wings” is the first of its kind aviation humor book designed to entertain the airplane enthusiast, air show visitor, cartoon lover, flight student, and pilot alike. In the style of aviators everywhere (chickens are aviators of a sort, aren’t they?) the dedicated employees of Roost Air “commit” their special aviation moments in a way that is all too true to life and down right hilarious.

Professional pilots in particular may even find themselves, after recovering from sidesplitting laughter, reflecting on the fact that there are lessons to be learned from the antics of the gang at Roost Air.

87 pages, black and white.

For a signed copy, please choose the option "one signed copy" below and make sure to drop us a line via email, or add instructions to the comments at checkout to tell us what you want Stefan to write (e.g. a dedication to someone). If we don't get any instructions, Stefan will write a dedicaction to the person who ordered!

name: Chicken Wings COMBO!
description:
Get all the Chicken Wings Books in this special super saver combo!

Chicken Wings – The First Book (ISBN 978-0741427182)

Chicken Wings 2 – Full Throttle (ISBN 978-1-4243-1029-6)

Chicken Wings 3 – Think Big (ISBN 978-1-60702-858-1)

Chicken Wings 4 - Gold Rush (ISBN 978-1-4675-2065-2)

For a signed copy, please choose the option "one signed copy" below and make sure to drop us a line via email, or add instructions to the comments at checkout to tell us what you want Stefan to write (e.g. a dedication to someone). If you want all four books of the combo signed, please choose "all copies signed". If we don't get any instructions, Stefan will write a dedicaction to the person who ordered!

name: Chicken Wings - Chuck's Helicopter Adventures
description:
Helicopter people behold! 
This is our first comic book just for you with 36 pages of Chuck’s helicopter adventures!

We are trying something new this time by going with a classic comic book / magazine type format and focusing simply on just a bunch of Chuck’s colorful helicopter comics. By dropping the fancy thick book cover we are able to give this to you for a classic comic book price as well.

Included in this book are our collection of helicopter and helicopter-related strips from Chuck’s adventures, some of them from our other books but with previously unpublished material included as well.
Also new is that we are including a few very early black-and-white classics with a little history about how they came to be and stories about the initial days of Chicken Wings.
Enjoy!

37 pages, full color
Product dimensions: 26,6  x 20,5 x 0,3 cm, 110g
Published by Michael and Stefan Strasser

name: eBook: Chicken Wings 4 - Gold Rush
description: The eBook version of our fourth book in MOBI format. You can also get this book it as an iPhone app through the iTunes store, as a Kindle version through Amazon, and, of course, in all it's physical glory as a paperback version, right here in this shop. Roost-Air is still in business. Seemingly unaffected by the economy the flying chickens are still going strong with Julio keeping Chuck flying and Chuck continuing to make the airspace less safe. Is Hans floating his yogurt money into the FBO? Will Chuck finish his Corsair this year? Is Julio ever going to get a few days off? What we do know is that Chuck once again is getting himself tangled up in all kinds of aviation adventures from flight instructing, to homebuliding, into RC planes and model rockets, over flight simming, all the way to flying helicopters. Chuck has to take a checkride and even applies to become an astronaut. He is also working on finding out more about the mystery chick at the bar and trying to help Julio in the hangar. Then one day a call comes in for Roost Air to deliver parts to the last frontier...

name: Ding Duck - I Want To Fly
description: The brand new book by Gary Clark, featuring the famous Ding Duck from The Swamp. This book is a snapshot of the wonderful and diverse world of aviation…It is about Commercial Air Transport, Military Jets, Helicopters, Aerobatics, General Aviation, Recreational Flying, and... Duck. Mostly it’s about Duck aviation... In particular one unique Duck named Ding. Despite receiving over 5000 flying lessons and many attempts, Ding Duck still can’t fly. But that doesn’t stop him trying and failing and trying again. The Swamp that Ding calls home features two good runways, an Air Traffic Controller, a Flying School and a host of other assorted wildlife including all the other Ducks who get to do what Ding is hoping to do himself one day.. Fly South for the Winter with all the other Ducks. As you follow Ding’s daily life cycle of flying attempts, failures, flying lessons, theory classes, exams and everything else that goes on in this feathered parallel world to the other less natural, mechanical form of aviation you will discover a wonderful truth: There is little difference between these two worlds and there is much humour to be enjoyed in both. This book is dedicated to everyone who has ever wanted to fly.

name: Julio's Hat "pre-work"
description:
As you all know, Julio is known for wearing a red ball cap all day, every day, and backwards so the brim doesn't get in the way while he is working.
Now you can have Julio's "Roost Air" hat as well.

"ROOST AIR" logo embroidered in the front.

Port & Company six panel twill cap
Adult size
adjustable strap in the back, velcro, just like Julio's hat

name: Please Wait, to be seated!
description:
“Please Wait, to be seated” is the third book of the very succesful aviation cartoon collection put together by Martin Leeuwis. This time he found 30 artists from around the globe to contribute and it includes 9 pages of “Chicken Wings” as well. This will hopefully hold you guys over until our 4th book comes out!
 
English, 160 pages, 350 cartoons, almost 50% color, A5 size softcover.
 
Contributing Artists:
Ton van Andel, Philippe Abbet, Jan van Alphen, Johan Baas, Jean-Luc Beghin, Nicola Bolton, Roger Bowles, Roger Brunel, Gary Clark, Nina Dietrich, Andrew Dodd, Martin Germans, Jason Hall, Patrick Harrington, Rob Knotts, Bob Lang, Bob Leenders, Annebet Leeuwis, Helmut Mauch, Theresa McCracken, Barry Munden, Willy Peeters, Tom Phelps, Nicolas Pug, Rabhea Roth, Chris Signore, Bob Stevens, Stefan and Mike Strasser, Dimitri Verdoodt, Clifford Witkowski

name: My First Airplane Coloring Book
description:
Chicken Wings' "My First Airplane Coloring Book" features characters and designs from Chicken Wings, as well as a variety of other illustrations of aircraft. If you are a pilot, chances are that your offspring is already infected with the aviation virus. And if not, the First Airplane Coloring Book by Chicken Wings might be the first step to get your son or daughter (or any other kid, for that matter) hooked on this fascinating subject! In any case, with the additional bonus of maybe producing a few minutes of peace and quite, this book is the perfect present!

32 pages, black and white
Published by Michael and Stefan Strasser
ISBN 978-1-60461-770-2

name: Christmas Card COMBO
description:
Receive all four Chicken Wings Christmas Cards in this great combo deal!

Includes:

1x "Right of Way" Christmas Card
1x "Last Minute Charter" Christmas Card
1x "Have A Fun Christmas" Card
1x "Christmas Hugs" Card
4 Envelopes

Product dimensions: 12,7 x 17,5 cm

name: Christmas Card "Right of Way"
description:
This card isn't just your average funny Christmas card! 
It's a complete comic strip as well!
Read it from front cover, to middle, to back cover!

AVAILABLE NOW!

Includes envelope.
Product dimensions: 12,7 x 17,5 cm

name: Christmas Card "Last Minute Charter"
description:
Never accept a last minute charter at Christmas Eve, or you will end up like Chuck, Julio, Sally and Hans! Outside shows the Roost Air Crew tied in front of Santas sleigh, with Julio telling Hans to "never accept a last minute charter at Christmas Eve". The inside shows them taking off in front of a beautiful winter landscape. 

Including envelope. Product dimensions: 5x7” (12,7 x 17,8 cm)

name: Christmas Card "Have A Fun Christmas"
description:
The perfect Christmas card for pilots and aviation enthusiasts! 

The outside of this card shows an airplane that appears to be steered by a flying snowman. On the inside you can see Julio and Sally working on a snowman, who obviously just got beheaded by a reckles pilot. Uhm... Chuck, is that you?


Envelope included. Product dimensions: 5x7” (12,7 x 17,8 cm)

name: Christmas Card "Christmas Hugs"
description:
Do you know a special someone who also has a “loved one” in the hangar? Then this card is perfect for you! 

The outside shows the message "Everybody needs a hug at Christmas" and Chuck with a Santa hat running towards the viewer. On the inside you see Chuck hugging his airplane and the message "So don't forget to hug all your loved ones! Merry Christmas!" 

Envelope included. Product dimensions: 5x7” (12,7 x 17,8 cm)

name: Full Power Ding Duck
description:
A whole book full of adventures of the (in)famous and legendary eternal flight student Ding Duck and his fellow birds from the Australian cartoon series "Swamp" by Gary Clark. Most of you may know him from his website or from samples of his cartoons in the Martin Leeuwis books. He has a huge following in Australia and can be found in all of Australias newspapers.

Full Power Ding Duck is a 128 pages of classic Swamp Aviation, Military and Wild Duck cartoons. 

Follow the ups and mostly downs of the worlds worst flying student Ding Duck as he attempts to fly. 
 
Book dimensions 218mm x 230mm ( Includes 12 pages of full colour strips )

name: T-Shirt "I Survived My First Solo Flight"
description:
This T-Shirt is the perfect gift for someone who has just suceeded with his/her first solo flight. But since it says "I survived my first solo flight", you can also use it for people who didn't really succeed, but at least managed to survive!

Main design printed on backside, with Chicken Wings Logo on front pocket. Color: White with black imprint. We kept this shirt whire on purpose so that friends and flight instructors can easily sign it with a textile marker. 100% cotton. Avaliable sizes: S-XXL.

name: "ATC" T-Shirt
description:
Backside reads "ATC -Do as I say or get the hell out of my airspace!"

Front reads "ATC".

So you're an Air Traffic Controller and want to extend your authority you have over pilots to other parts of your life? This t-shirt might be the first step towards achieving that goal! (Caution: Might create conflict or confusion with more than one person in a room wearing this shirt).

name: "Basic Helicopter Maneuvers - Shallow Approach" T-Shirt
description:
Show the world you know how to pick up women and are current on all your flight maneuvers at the same time! There will be an official investigation to see if this shirt will actually be beneficial as an aid to pick up "chicks" (yes, we at "Chicken Wings" are allowed to say "chicks" without any consequences. It says so in our Trademark!)

We actually have confirmation that this line worked on at least one occasion. It so happens that the "real" Chuck actually used this line to pick who is now his wife. Their first date was a helicopter ride and they got married 6 months after.

Needless to say they both often sport matching Chicken Wings shirts when seen at the airport together...

name: T-Shirt "Aerodynamics Lesson 1"
description:
The “classic” and probably most popular one of our t-shirts. Teach others the laws of aerodynamics. Featuring "Slip, Drag, P-Factor, and CG" explanations for everybody to understand! Perfect for flight instructors to make sure the basic lessons sink in every time they turns their back to their students when writing on the board....

The shirt will also tell you if you are dealing with "pedestrians" (probably not laughing at the pictures) or "aviators" or "aviation educated" people (most likely cracking up at your t-shirts) which could come in handy. "Handy for what?" you might ask....   Well we don't really know yet. But you get the point, right?!

Main design printed on backside, with Chicken Wings Logo on front pocket. Color: Heather grey with black imprint. 85% cotton, 15% viscose. <font color="#660000">Currently low on stock and limited sizes available: Avaliable sizes are L-XXL.</font>

name: GfiVE - Geschichte(ln) des Verkaufs
description:
GERMAN ONLY Ein Comicbuch des Chicken Wings Zeichners Stefan Strasser, gemeinsam geschrieben mit Patrick Bubna-Litic und Ingeborg Hofbauer.

Die Menschheitsgeschichte ist eine einzige Verkaufsgeschichte!
Von den Anfangen der Menschheit, bis zum Ende eines Verkäuferdaseins, wird in diesem spritzig intelligentem und durchaus anspruchsvollem Comic, vom Leiden des modernen Verkäufers erzählt, seinem ewigen und heldenhaften Kampf gegen Gleichgültigkeit, Unverständnis, Borniertheit, nicht nachvollziehbaren Entscheidungen, im Dickicht labyrinthischer Entscheidungswege, gegen mächtige Vorgesetzte, ohne jede Ahnung von der Praxis und gegen seinen, seit ewig existierenden Feind- den Preis!

Format: Hardcover, 57 Seiten, 21x21cm
Herausgegeben von GfiVE Verlag: GfiVEmedia - www.gfive.at
ISBN 978-3-200-01640-8

name: Hirn mit Ei
description: GERMAN ONLY "Die Kameradenschweine" ist eine Cartoonserie von Stefan Strasser zum Thema Feuerwehr, die regelmäßig in der Zeitschrift FEUERWEHROBJEKTIV veröffentlicht wird. In diesem kleinen Büchlein sind die besten Cartoons der letzten Jahre, gemeinsam mit der süffisanten Kolumne "Hirn mit Ei" gesammelt.

name: Aviation Humor
description:
All the aviation jokes that have been circling around on the Internet are now together in one book. About 500 jokes and also hundreds of one-liners (aviationisms..) were collected by Ziva Bergman and are included in this handy A5 sized book with 148 pages. In the book more than 700 entries which makes it the book with the most aviation humor ever published.

It is text only, no cartoons.

name: Say When and How
description:
A combination of "Say when" (1993) and "Say how" (1995) of the long running series by Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel combined in one band. Fully updated but all content of both books in a 200 page A5 book with new cover.

English, 200 pages, black and white, A5 sized soft cover.

name: Going Up, Sir
description:
"Going Up, Sir" is the successor of the very successful book "Good Landing", another collection of aviation related comics and cartoons by 21 different artists from around the world. Each artist fills some pages of the 160 pages, none of them more than 8% of total book, and they all look at aviation on their own, special, way. Of course, it also includes 13 pages of Chicken Wings comics! About half of the book is in full color.

English, 160 pages, 50% color, 50% black and white, A5 size softcover.

Contributing Artists:

Ton van Andel, Philippe Abbet, Johan Baas, Steve Barba, Nicola Bolton, Gary Clark, Martin Germans, Jason Hall, Harald Havas, Wende Huizer, Bob Lang, Bob Leenders, Annebet Leeuwis, Helmut Mauch, Rob Mulders, Barry Munden, Stefan Neuwinger, Herbert Plompen, Stefan & Mike Strasser, Peter Welleman, Heinz Wolf

name: Good Landing
description:
Good Landing contains 160 pages with cartoons and comics from 20 different artists from around the world. Each artist fills some pages, none of them more than 8% of total book, and they all look at aviation on their own, special, way. Of course, it also includes 13 pages of Chicken Wings comics! About half of the book is in full color.


English, 160 pages, 50% color, 50% black and white, A5 size softcover.

Contributing Artists:

Ton van Andel, Philippe Abbet, Jan van Alphen, Johan Baas, Roger Brunel, Gary Clark, Iain Dick, Nina Dietrich + Harald Havas, Toon van Driel, Fabian Goossens, Michael Hopkins, Bob Leenders, Annebet Leeuwis, Chris Manno, Helmut Mauch, Barry Munden, Herbert Plompen, Mike Ray, Stefan + Mike Strasser, Dimitri Verdoodt

name: Say Again + Say No More
description:
Aviation humor and cartoons by Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel. This special issue was released at the 25th anniversary of the "Say..." publications. It combines the full content of the books "Say Again" and "Say no more" under one cover, with a careful and thorough update of all images and captions.

This books is fun and casual reading, and what's more: You get two books for the price of one!

English, 200 pages, black and white, A5 softcover.

name: Say Chocks Away
description:
The latest addition to the famous "Say..." series of aviation cartoons and humor books by Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel. Another 160 pages of cartoons and short anecdotes, aimed at all pilots of the world.

English, 160 pages, black and white, A5 size softcover.

name: Say Coffee or Tea?
description:
The fifth book of the famous "Say.." series of aviation humor books by Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel.

First published in 2001, this book is already in its second printing. It contains some cartoons from the first four books and more text (jokes and anecdotes) than the other books of this series. The book is aimed at cabin attendants, but also very readable for everybody involved in aviation.

English, 160 pages, black and white, A5 size softcover.

name: Say Heading
description:
Aviation humor by Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel. The sixth book of the popular "Say..." series. Published 2003.

English, 160 pages, black and white, A5 size softcover.

name: Say Something
description:
25 years after their first publication, Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel have publisher their 8th book. Another 160 pages of cartoons and short anecdotes, aimed at all pilots of the world.

English, 160 pages, black and white, A5 size softcover.

name: Skyteam
description:
This book is the "Best Of" of the popular "Say..." aviation humor series by Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel and contains a compilation of the best parts from all their books so far. Initially it was just created as a Christmas gift for the KLM pilots, but it turned out to be so successful, that they decided to reprint it and add it to their regular list of publications.

English, 160 pages, black and white, A5 size softcover.

name: Squawk 7700
description:
Even though this book is not the classic "Chicken Wings style" humor book, we highly recommend this work for everybody who is interested in flying for the airlines. This book is an eyeopener about how the business really works and Peter, who is personal friend of ours, is a driving force in making aviation a safer place. Embark on a journey with him and follow his career from dreaming about flying as a little boy all the way to flying for the airlines. You might get a slight "reality check" reading this book but we know many pilots who now wish they knew more about the industry before they started making their dream of flying the big planes come true.

t's not all "Top Gun" and big salaries out there in "the real world"...

Foreword by Jeff Skiles, Hudson Miracle Co-Pilot of US Airways Flight 1649

Published by Peter M. Buffington
ISBN-10: 0-9712084-1-7
ISBN-13: 987-0-9712084-1-4

Author welcomes email feedback at:
avitengineer@yahoo.com

This book was written, printed, and published in the USA!

name: This Is Your Captain Speaking
description: This Is Your Captain Speaking - A Common Sense Manual for Keeping Your Wings Level By Captain Ed Owen While admittedly somewhat limited (about the width and height of an aircraft windscreen) and woefully short of the "big picture", the pilot's perspective offers some unique insights. Those insights are presented as a series of tales (of the sort told by flight crews everywhere) that, while amusing and lighthearted, give reason to pause and think. Published by iUniverse, Inc. (December 20, 2004) English, 296 pages ISBN 0595331793 Product Dimensions: 9.0 x 6.0 x 0.7 inches Shipping Weight: 460g Our Review: You really have to check out the unique tales of this pilot. We have taken him in and made him a Chicken Wings character for many reasons but one sticks out: He is really funny !! His book is really a good gift for anybody you know who loves to read. It's a compilation of tales and funny stories that are very, very loosely connected. This alone also makes it perfect for a pilot like Chuck who can’t follow a storyline through the whole book. But you don’t have to be a pilot to enjoy this book. It’s a lighthearted outlook on life through the eyes of an aviator. We would even go a step further and claim him to be sort of a “modern Saint Exupery” we like the book so much. It is also extremely well written and a real pleasure to read. And since Captain Ed is a friend of ours (hell, he’s Chucks uncle for crying out loud) we can offer you every copy signed by the author!

name: True Pilot Stories
description:
True Pilot Stories is a collection of stories by veteran writer Patricia Lorenz and over 50 commercial, cargo, military, private, experimental, helicopter, hot-air balloon and blimp pilot pilots from all over the country. Male, female, young, old, these true stories will give you a whole new feel and understanding of the world of aviation. From hilarious stories and pranks they pull on each other and their crews to white-knuckle, hair-raising adventure stories, air travel will suddenly take on a whole new meaning. Fasten your seat belt. You're in for the ride of your life.

Among the contributors of this book, you will also find Mike from Chicken Wings and our friend Captian Ed Owen.

About the Author:
Patricia Lorenz is an art-of-living writer and speaker and is the author of six books and over four hundred published articles, essays and stories. She's one of the top contributors to the Chicken Soup for the Soul books with stories in over two dozen of them. She's contributing writer to three dozen anthologies and fifteen Daily Guideposts books; and an award-winning columnist.

Paperback, 262 pages, English
Publisher: Infinity Publishing (September, 2005)
ISBN: 0741427958
Product Dimensions: 1,5 x 14 x 21,3 cm

name: Sally's Airplane Cookie Cutter
description:
Just in time for the Holidays: Sally's airplane cookie cutters!

Are you tired of the same old cookie shapes? The stars, the angels, and the christmas trees? Check out how Sally shapes he cookies - aviation style!

One Tin Cookie Cutter.

name: Sally's Helicopter Cookie Cutters
description:
Just in time for the Holidays: Sally's helicopter cookie cutters!

Are you tired of the same old cookie shapes? The stars, the angels, and the christmas trees? Check out how Sally shapes her cookies - aviation style!

With Sally being Sally, this one is "loosely based" on what she calls "Airwolf". You can kinda see a Bell 222 in there if you look closely, right?

Quantity: One Tin Cookie Cutter

(does not come with cookie dough, since we're based in Vegas we want to shy away from selling anything perishable)

name: Julio's Hat "post-work"
description:
Here is how Julio's hat looks after doing a complete overhaul on the Twin Otter or the helicopter when forced to work with Chuck and pulling his hair out. All these over-nighters are taking a toll on Julio and respectively his ball cap...

You might find some sweaty feathers in this one!

District Threads, distressed Cap
Distressed finish, soft feel, looks like well loved favorite!
6 panels
closure: metal D-ring slider buckle with hide-away strap

name: Mouse Pad, Sectional, Los Angeles, LAX
description:
23,5 x 19,7 x 0,3 cm Hard Top, Heavy Duty Mouse Pad

Made In USA

name: Classic Instrument Coasters
description:
Chuck has them all over his house! Not only to show off and impress the chicks but also to keep current! 

. . . but somehow neither one seems to be working for him.

Trintec's round coasters are made of clear acrylic and have four rubber feet on their underside to ensure stability and avoid surface damage.
Dimensions: 9.85 cm diameter
Imprint area: 9.20 cm

name: Vintage Instrument Drink Coasters
description:
Chucks favorite set of coasters since they almost resemble F4-U gages! 

This Vintage Instrument six-pack coaster set almost resembles the cockpit of Chuck's Corsair . . . almost.

Of course he wouldn't know since he doesn't have an instument panel for his vintage F4-U Corsair yet. But you better believe he has one of these sets! We also like the fact that it comes in a set of 6 instead of the usual 4 coasters you see everywhere else.

The Trintec coasters are made with a tough polystyrene frame and a black rubber anti-skid base. Sold in sets of 6. 

Another unique treat we think is that the actual package ships out arranged like a real IFR six-pack set-up. Perfect to fit your own ice cold six-pack right out of the beer fridge!

name: Desk Alarm Clock, Altimeter
description:
Trintec classic aviation alarm clocks are made to simulate a primary flight instrument as closely as possible. This alarm clock features the actual shape of an altimeter with a dial that closely represents an altimeter as well.

Features:
- Injection molded from high impact styrene and features a real glass lens for durability and scratch resistance. In other words, it’s almost Chuck-safe!
- High quality American made Quartz alarm clock movement for accuracy and many years of reliable service.

One AA alkaline battery required (not included).
Comes with one year warranty from the factory.
Dimensions: 9 x 9 cm

name: EGOLETS, 5 Stripe Gag Epaulets
description:
This gag gift is pretty much our favorite item in the store. Five gold stripes in black epaulet.

Designed to do your Captain a "one-up" to see if he notices, or maybe you're even brave enough to put them on when you're going on your next airline flight. You never know it might get you into the cockpit. Or try to wear them during an interview?!

Disclaimer: "Chicken Wings" does not take responsibility if the joke backfires. The timing is up to you. Use responsibly!

name: "AVGAS ONLY" Coffee Mug
description:
We all know how much pilots and mechanics love their coffee! Julio couldn’t function without it. But at least, Sally makes the best coffee at the airport!
 
This 16 oz. (ca. 500ml) stainless, double-wall insulated mug helps a pilot’s personal fuel supply stay hot or cold, and will certainly draw humorous attention.
The placard is super-sized so even Hans can read it with his thick glasses!

Padded non-slip bottom, no-spill lid, 15cm tall, 8,5cm diameter.

name: Airplane Paper Clips
description: These paperclips are 2,5 x 3 cm in size. They come 40 to a pack and are stored in the included aluminum aviation storage tin (which probably isn't aviation grade aluminum and more like tin but it's pretty neat either way).

name: Helicopter Paper Clips
description:
Chuck has them littered all over his office!

Any helicopter fan will want these 1.5" long silver helicopter shaped paper clips. They come with 25 of them attractively packaged in a desktop ready storage tin.

name: Key Chain "Airplane Keys"
description:
Are you as tired of the old “Remove Before Flight” flimsy keychains with the letters screenprinted on it as we are?

Here is something fresh, new and tough! The raised white lettering is embroidered on both sides of a stiff, durable, narrow bordered material. It comes with a large steel ring to easily hold all types of keys and measures 14 x 2,5 cm.

name: Propeller Letter Opener
description: New from the Boeing Store: A Propeller Letter Opener! It’s a great gift for every pilot. With its streamlined design of heavy zinc alloy and brushed-metal finish, it makes a beautiful object d’art for every desktop. And it really spins! CAUTION: requires an 8” clutter free radius on your desk in order to freely spin! Measures approximately 19cm in length.

name: Key Chain "Helicopter Pilot"
description:
Are you as tired of the old “Remove Before Flight” flimsy keychains with the letters screenprinted on it as we are?

Here is something fresh, new and tough! The raised white lettering is embroidered on both sides of a stiff, durable, narrow bordered material. It comes with a large steel ring to easily hold all types of keys and measures 14 x 2,5 cm

name: Bumper Sticker "Caution"
description:
Show your appreciation for airplanes and airports with this bright and colorful bumper sticker!
Great new bumper sticker. Self explanitory, we believe!

"CAUTION! This Vehicle Stops At All Airports!"

7,6 cm tall and 29,2cm wide.

We like it so much we have one on our "Chicken"-Mobile!

name: Key Chain "Flight Crew"
description:
Are you as tired of the old “Remove Before Flight” flimsy keychains with the letters screenprinted on it as we are?

Here is something fresh, new and tough! The raised white lettering is embroidered on both sides of a stiff, durable, narrow bordered material. It comes with a large steel ring to easily hold all types of keys and measures 14 x 2,5 cm.

name: Silver Chicken (10 year anniversary silver coin)
description: The front of the “Silver Chicken”, our 10 year anniversary commemorative coin, is very loosely based on the American Silver Eagle One Dollar Silver Coin when it comes to the layout. But it’s more awesome since it features one of the coolest WW2 fighter planes ever built. Also it’s funnier because it has Chuck on the face of the coin instead of Lady Liberty (no offense Lady Liberty, we love you!). Also, even though the numbers of the 2011 Eagles aren’t final yet, the mintage of the 2010 Silver Eagle was 34,764,500 ounces. The mintage of the “Silver Chicken” is 60 ounces. So naturally, it will be worth way more in the future. Or if not, it’s still pure silver and we all know the price of silver is bound to go up. Specifications: Size: 39mm diameter Encapsulated to keep Chuck shiny for a long time Weight: 31.10g (one troy ounce of .999 fine silver)

name: “Japanese Skywriter” Mouspad / Notepad
description:
This multifunctional product is a mouse pad, a notepad, and a funny joke rolled into one! Use it for your mouse, scribble down notes, and when you’re done, simply rip off the top page and take it with you. Product is the size of a typical mouse pad with rounded corners and has 50 pages.

Product dimensions: 19 x 24 cm, with 50 sheets of paper, glued on two sides, rounded corners.

name: WWII Airplane Spotter Playing Cards
description:
Chucks favorite deck of cards. Could there be an F-4 Corsair in there?

Each card features 3 silhouettes of an Allied and Axis Power WWII aircraft, as it would be seen by a ground observer or from another airplane. They had aircraft recognition charts just like it in WWII and of course that makes it really interesting for our hero Chuck.

Play cards and learn about these classic airplanes!
